memberdef.argsstring: (struct ssh_common_struct *common, int verbosity, const char *function, const char *format,...)
memberdef.name: ssh_log_common

briefdescription.para: Set the log level of the library.

simplesect.para: SSH_OK on success, SSH_ERROR on error.

briefdescription.para: Get the log level of the library.

simplesect.para: The value of the log level.

briefdescription.para: Get the pointer to the logging callback function.

simplesect.para: The pointer the the callback or NULL if none set.

briefdescription.para: Get the userdata of the logging function.

simplesect.para: The userdata if set or NULL.

briefdescription.para: Set the userdata for the logging function.
